com.bnotions.vicinity.device
Interface DeviceListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
RemoteActivity, RemoteCommManager, ServerActivity, ServerCommManager
public interface DeviceListener

A callback interface that defines device state changes and received messages.

Since:
2012-06-13
Author:
Matthew Patience
